I. Bed Wars updates
a. Horn event
-Play the game daily can receive lots of rewardsin horn event! including pets, Sword trail，Special arrow effect, custom emotes and more generous rewards.
2. mysterious treasure challenge event
-complete challenges to get helmet, tools skin, custom emotes and runes!
3. New pets limited time offers
-New amazing pets, limited time discounts!
4. New solo queue, duo queue (including three new maps)
5. New Block skin store
6. User Interface optimization
7. Performance optimization
-improved game fluency

II. Jigasaw Event
a.Collect fragments by time spent playing the game, fragments could be traded with friends and could be combined to get the reward.
b.Reward Library: Display all the available rewards
c.Fragment chest: Could be claimed by time spent playing the game, get random fragments if opened
d.Gifting fragments: fragments could be gifted between friends

ⅲ. Shop
-Four new suits and one new item added

bug fixed

bug fixed

一、Thanksgiving Event is Online
二、VIP rework, and here are the details
1.Monly G-cube reward increased for VIP members，and they are:
- VIP（From 30Gcubes to 66Gcubes）
- VIP+ (From 180Gcubes to 360Gccubes)
- MVP（From 600Gcubes to 800Gcubes）
Note：Monly reward could be claimed immediately after subscription
2.Add MVP+（2000Gcubes）
3.The price of MVP reduced，from $11.99 to $9.99
4.New VIP exclusive fragments added，to unlock more fine items
5.Adjust the top up bonus rate，from the progressive rate to fixed 10% of bonus
6.With the joining of G-cube reward，we removed the B-cube reward
7.500 maximum friend limit is no longer a privilege for VIP members，now all players can have 500 friends，start adding friends to party！
8.VIP is now fully supports subscription function

Important：Because we no longer give B-cubes for VIPs，and we do monthly reward instead of daily，for VIP players now we give all the B-cubes all in once，please claim them in mail

New games released
1.Vice city
2.Island(Build at sea)
3.Anime fighting simulator
